description: Contains all resources (images, fonts, stylesheets, etc.) used by BYTM

alwaysExternalAssetPatterns.description: List of patterns passed to `new RegExp()` that should always be considered external assets (they won't be loaded via @resource)

resources.description: Mapping of resource file identifiers and paths

path.description: Path or URL to the resource. If it starts with /, it's relative to the project root, else it's relative to the assets folder. Query strings and hashes are allowed. You may make use of $MODE, $BRANCH, $HOST, $BUILD_NUMBER and $UID

ref.description: Branch, tag, or commit SHA to use when fetching the resource. You may make use of $MODE, $BRANCH, $HOST, $BUILD_NUMBER and $UID

integrity.description: Whether to calculate a Subresource Integrity hash for the resource (works with any URLs too)
